Description: The Johnson Controls Pegasys P2000 server with software before 3.11 allows remote attackers to trigger false alerts via crafted packets to TCP port 41013 (aka the upload port), a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-2607.
clean_description: johnson controls pegasys p2000 server software 3.11 allows remote attackers trigger false alerts crafted packets tcp port 41013 aka upload port different vulnerability cve-2012-2607
